The overall fan interest decreases a lot!

Sincerly,
Your PR Director

a promotion wouldn't hurt him at all.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Monday, 5/1/1993
Subject: Status of Mickey Morandini
Dear Sir,
Mickey Morandini shouldn't play at AA Arkansas Travelers!
He has an AVG of .143 over there, that might
be a sign that he has been promoted to soon. You
should demote him before he gets burned.

Regards,
Scouting Director
